segments.text: Honey , wait ! I've sprained my ankle .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , my god , are you OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on , sit down , and let me have a look .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I told you to wear running shoes . But you don't listen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought leather shoes will do just as well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hold on , don't move , I will take care of that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are you going to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will get some ice , and put it on your ankle.How does that feel ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Be brave . Don't worry . You will be able to walk soon .
segments.speaker: S2
